headline: The Zacks Analyst Blog Highlights Exxon Mobil, Home Depot, IBM and Friedman Industries
summary: XOM, HD, IBM, and FRD show resilience with production, digital strategy, AI growth, and capital discipline amid macro headwinds.

headline: Appian Appoints David Crozier as Chief Marketing Officer
summary: Appian (NASDAQ: APPN), today announced the appointment of David Crozier to the position of Chief Marketing Officer, effective July 21, 2025. He will report to Appian's CEO, Matt Calkins.

raw.headline: Appian Appoints David Crozier as Chief Marketing Officer
raw.summary: Appian (NASDAQ: APPN), today announced the appointment of David Crozier to the position of Chief Marketing Officer, effective July 21, 2025. He will report to Appian's CEO, Matt Calkins.

headline: Winners in 2025 Stevie® Awards for Great Employers Announced
summary: Winners in the 2025 (10th annual) Stevie® Awards for Great Employers were announced today. The awards recognize the world's best employers and the human resources professionals, teams, achievements, and HR-related products and suppliers who help to create and drive great places to work.

raw.headline: Winners in 2025 Stevie® Awards for Great Employers Announced
raw.summary: Winners in the 2025 (10th annual) Stevie® Awards for Great Employers were announced today. The awards recognize the world's best employers and the human resources professionals, teams, achievements, and HR-related products and suppliers who help to create and drive great places to work.

headline: IBM and Moderna Team Up on Quantum Study. What It Means for the World of Medicine.
summary: International Business Machines  said Thursday that it had joined forces with  Moderna  for a case study that evidenced quantum computing’s promise in medicine.  While Moderna isn’t looking to replace classical computing with quantum entirely, the company is interested in building a “quantum-enabled biotechnology pipeline.”  If that terminology rings a bell, it’s because that same mRNA approach is central to Moderna’s Covid-19 vaccine.
